channel.title: Ahpache - RS Remake
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://ahpache.info/new-img/ahpache.png[/img] [size=12pt]by Exion[/size]
[b][size=14pt][img]http://ahpache.info/favicon.ico[/img]Website (Updated)[img]http://ahpache.info/favicon.ico[/img][/size][/b] [size=8pt](I got permission from The Soul)[/size] [size=12pt][url=http://ahpache.com]Ahpache.com[/url] | [url=http://ahpache.com/community]Register on the forums![/url][/size]
[b]Important: To those of you wondering about my last project, I decided to scrap it. I "kinda" messed up some things that would take forever to fix, so I thought I would just restart. Also, it seems that RS Remakes are getting pretty popular so I decided I would start developing one.[/b]
[size=14pt][b][img]http://ahpache.info/favicon.ico[/img]Server Development Progress[img]http://ahpache.info/favicon.ico[/img][/b][/size][/center]
[b][size=14pt]Information:[/size][/b] Base: PI/RS Server Type: Economy This isn't going to be a true RuneScape Remake, but one close to it. I'm only developing certain parts of the game that are mostly used. Only major areas of the game are going to be replicated, like towns and cities, training areas, dungeons, minigames, etc. What I'm striving for is a decent economy, lot's of areas for players to explore, a decent skilling system, and of course to increase my knowledge.
[b][size=14pt]Features:[/size][/b] [size=12pt][b]NPC:[/b][/size]
[ul][li]NPC Clipping[/li] [li]Accurate NPC drops[/li] [li]Accurate agression[/li] [li]Correct NPC stats[/li][/ul]
[i]Main Training Areas:[/i] (All NPC's in correct places, correct drops, correct stats)
[ul][li]Edgeville dungeon[/li] [li]Varrock dungeon[/li] [li]Draynor dungeon[/li] [li]Taverley dungeon[/li] [li]TzHaar Stronghold[/li] [li]Relleka Slayer Cave[/li] [li]Slayer Tower[/li] [li]Bandits[/li][/ul]
[i]Towns Completed:[/i] (All NPC's in correct places, correct shops)
[ul][li]Lumbridge[/li] [li]Varrock[/li] [li]Falador[/li] [li]Draynor[/li] [li]Rimmington[/li] [li]Edgeville[/li] [li]Catherby[/li] [li]Canifis[/li] [li]Relleka[/li] [li]Yanille[/li] [li]Taverley[/li] [li]Al Kharid[/li] [li]Miscellania[/li][/ul]
[i]Guilds:[/i] (All NPC's in correct places, correct requirements, correct shops, benefits)
[size=12pt][b]Player:[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Clipped following[/li] [li]Clipped combat[/li] [li]Correct item requirements, stats, bonuses[/li][/ul]
[size=12pt][b]Minigames:[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Barrows[/li] [li]Castle wars[/li] [li]Duel arena[/li] [li]Pest control[/li] [li]Mage arena[/li] [li]Fight cave[/li] [li]Fight pits[/li][/ul]
[size=12pt][b]Skills:[/b][/size]
[size=12pt][b]Other:[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Correct sendMessages[/li] [li]Correct NPC/Player dialogues[/li] [li]Correct teleporting[/li] [li]Skill menus[/li][/ul]
[center][size=14pt][b][img]http://ahpache.info/favicon.ico[/img]Server Media[img]http://ahpache.info/favicon.ico[/img][/b][/size] More pictures can be found [url=http://ahpache.com/screenshots/]here[/url. (Just incase I run out of room on here).
[img]http://ahpache.com/screenshots/monkey_skeletons.png[/img]
[img]http://ahpache.com/screenshots/monkey_guards.png[/img]
[img]http://ahpache.com/screenshots/miths.png[/img]
[img]http://ahpache.com/screenshots/ranging.png[/img]
[img]http://ahpache.com/screenshots/gwd.png[/img]
[img]http://ahpache.com/screenshots/random.png[/img]
[img]http://ahpache.com/screenshots/runite.png[/img]
[img]http://ahpache.com/screenshots/heal.png[/img]
[img]http://ahpache.com/screenshots/skillguides.png[/img]
[img]http://ahpache.com/screenshots/skillcape.png[/img]
[img]http://ahpache.com/screenshots/tasksystem.png[/img] [/center]

@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Remembering him stating something about how he put the server down because he needed to do a lot of development on it, I’m assuming since he let the domain get suspended (assuming the kiddos sent him an e-mail about the suspension) that he has been inactive (as stated above). Anyway, I think he said it would take like two-three months but I think it’s been past that, a long time ago actually, don’t remember.

item.title: Ahpache - RS Remake
item.dc:creator: @g0d_of_war1 g0d of war1
item.description:
@g0d_of_war1 wrote:

[quote=“kill you704, post:125, topic:418451”][quote author=Arcalamus link=topic=520995.msg3979338#msg3979338 date=1335052317]

This is crap. It’s BattleScape. And laggy as hell, too.

You’re smoking crack.
[/quote]Pretty sure you are. This is BATTLESCAPE. And it’s laggy like crazy. And the content sucks too. So many glitchy features. Not even range projectiles are right.

You my friend are my mentally challenged. First of all its not battlescape, its Ahpache. Secondly, ive been playing all day, didnt lag once. Thirdly, i got 92 range and everything was almost flawless. I explored also, almost everything around the server, there are no glitches at all, there are just some features that simply do not work, its no a glitch, they just dont work becuase they are not coded in yet. Btw go die in a hole, exion worked his ass off on this the past 6 months and you come here to try and put him down. I know for a fact he worked his ass off because the 3 days ive been playing he hasnt stopped making new updates and adding new content i tell him about.[/quote] Exion long time no chat? seems everything is coming along quite well, keep up the good work

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

Arcalamus:

This is crap. It’s BattleScape. And laggy as hell, too.

Not BattleScape, it’s RiotScape. I also recommend getting off your taco bell connection. Also, not much content? Glitchy features? IT’S A BETA! WHAT DO YOU EXPECT? Idiot.

Jacob_:

You should build with JDK6 so users’ with JRE6 & 7 can load the client without the unsupported class version error.

Did that about 20 minutes ago.
